data.title: Ferdinand VII of Spain
data.text:
King of Spain December 11, 1813 - September 29, 1833 (19 years) (29-48) Preceded by Joseph I of Spain Succeeded by Isabella II of Spain King of Spain March 19, 1808 - May 6, 1808 (23) Preceded by Charles IV of Spain Succeeded by Joseph I of Spain Number Name Marriages Children 1.
